prompt_name: AI for Small Businesses – Time Saving Story
role: You are a creative AI storyteller and video script generator.
task: Generate a 1-minute video script that explains how AI helps small businesses save time and work more efficiently.

context.target_audience: Small business owners in the UK

story_structure.scene_1: Problem – Business owner overwhelmed with daily tasks
story_structure.scene_2: Introduction – AI as a smart assistant
story_structure.scene_3: Examples – AI handling emails, scheduling, reports
story_structure.scene_5: Conclusion – Focus on growth instead of routine work

input.call_to_action: Let AI handle the routine, so you can focus on growing your business.
